  1. Description
  2. Classes and Interfaces

Package com.comp2042.ui

package com.comp2042.ui
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DynamicStartScreen
    Animated start screen with pulsating grid, flying tetrominoes, and particles.
    Effects
    UI effect helpers for reflections, glow, score popups, and pulse animations.
    GameOverOverlay
    Game over overlay with restart and exit actions, supporting a special display for new high scores.
    GameRenderer
    Renders the board, active brick, next bricks, and hold brick, supporting standard and upside-down visual modes with utility effects.
    GhostBrickHandler
    Renders and positions a translucent ghost brick indicating the landing position of the active brick, supporting upside-down mode.
    GuiController
    JavaFX controller coordinating UI initialization, input handling, rendering, overlays, and bindings with the core game logic.
    MusicManager
    Manages game audio playback for music loops and effects, including start-screen music, gameplay loop, one-shot FX, and click sounds.
    OverlayManager
    Coordinates start, help, pause, and game-over overlays; controls transitions, countdowns, and interaction with music and game controller.
    PauseOverlay
    Pause overlay providing resume, main menu, and new game actions.
    SceneManager
    Scene/layout utilities for centering the game board and binding positions to scene or parent dimensions.
    ScorePopup
    Floating popup that displays score bonuses and combo labels with fade/translate transitions.
